Kuvuga ngo ndagukunda ntabwo ari itegeko ko bigomba kuvugwa hakoreshejwe ijwi.
Kuvuga ngo ndwaye igifu ntibibabisobanutse neza kuko indwara zacyo ari nyinshi kandi zivurwa ku buryo butandukanye.
Kuvuga ni byiza ariko kuvuga ibikujemo byose si byiza Rutakamize Paul Suko se di?
Kuvuga rero ko umugore ari uw'umuryango bishatse kuvuga ko nta burenganzira bwo guhitamo no guhakana muri icyo gihe yari afite.
Kuvugisha ukuri ni ikintu usanga kigenda gicika mu bantu ku buryo umuntu ugufite yifuzwa na bose.
Kuvuka ku babyeyi bombi b'abanyabugeni byamufashije gukabya inzozi ze no gufata umurongo uhamye mu bugeni bwibanda ku gushushanya.
Kuvumbura amagambo asobekeranyije, imibare iri mu tuzu, guhuza amabara n'ibindi bigira uruhare runini mu gufata neza ubwonko bw'umuntu.

Kuvura impyiko basaba kujya kwa muganga, akaba ariwe umenya icyo gukora.

Make-up isaba ibikoresho byabugenewe Ugiye kwisiga neza mu maso agomba kubanza kuhakaraba neza n'amazi meza, akihanagura akaba kandi afite ikirahure cy'indorerwamo kinini kiboneka neza.
Make-up kandi ngo ijyana n'ikirere, iyo hakonje cyangwa hashyushye, hakaba iyo bisiga ku manywa n'iyo bisiga nijoro.
Make-up ni ingenzi cyane, kandi ni ngombwa guhitamo umuhanga mu gusiga cyangwa gukora make-up.

Muri make, iyi nsanganyamatsiko irashaka kuvuga ko buri muntu wese akwiye kumva ko ari inshingano ye kugira uruhare mu kwiga, kwigisha, gusakaza, kunoza no kurengera Ikinyarwanda kuko ari igihangano n'umurage by'Abanyarwanda bose.
Muri make, iyo ushoboye gucunga neza imirire yawe, ugafata indyo yuzuye, bigufasha no kunesha ibigeragezo uhura na byo muri rusange kuko uba ushobora gucunga neza (control) imirire.
Muri make jyewe ndamunenga cyane, ariko ndamwifuriza kwikosora, akavugisha ukuri kandi arakuzi neza, kwikosora nibyiza cyane kuko nta ntungane iba hano ku isi, byongeye Imana ikunda abantu biokosara bagendeye mu kuri.

Muri make ngo bifatwa nko gukomeza kuzamura ukuvugwa mu bitangazamakuru bitandukanye.

Muri make, uburezi ngo butuma gahunda zose igihugu kihaye kizigeraho uko zakabaye, ndetse bugafasha kuzishyira mu bikorwa.
Muri make umuntu aba agomba kugira ubushishozi mu byo abwira uwo bakundana bitewe na gahunda bafitanye".

Ni abo ngabo twe tuzi."

Ni byiza kurinda uruhu rwawe by'umwihariko kugira ngo rutangizwa n'imirasire y'izuba, bityo ruhore rusa neza.
Ni byiza kurusimbura nibura buri myaka ibiri (2) kandi bigakorwa mu gihe gitangira izuba.
Ni byiza kuvuga ibyo uzi.
Ni byiza kwambara inkweto zigukwiriye kuko bizarinda ibirenge byawe guhura n'ibibazo byo kuribwa nazo.
Ni byiza kwigirira icyizere no kwishimira uwo uri we, aho kwirata no kwibona uko utari.
Ni byiza kwinjiza mu mirire yawe ubwoko bwose bw'ibyo umubiri ukeneye nka vitamin zo mu bwoko bwa B12, imyunyu ngugu nka Zinc ifasha ubwonko guhamana ubuzima bwiza.
Ni byiza kwitabira, kuri wowe ni ikintu cyiza nk'umunyapolitiki ukiri muto, ufite ishyaka rishya, twe dufite imyaka 25 muri iyi politiki mu Rwanda, tuzi byinshi kubarusha.

Ni byiza nkuko twabivuze ko mubanza kubiganiraho.
Ni byiza rero ko ababyeyi bafata iyambere mu burere bw'abana babo, abandi nk'abarimu n'inshuti zindi z'umuryango bakaza bongera ku burere n'umuco umwana ahabwa n'ababyeyi, bikarushaho kuba byiza ku bw'ubufatanye bwa benshi.
Ni byiza rero ko buri mugore wese yumva ko umugabo ari mugenzi we Imana yamuhaye ngo babane mu mahoro, mu bwumvikane, mu bwuzuzanye no mu bwubahane.
Ni byiza rero ko muri iyi siporo, abantu batangira kujya babwirwa ko kubungabunga ibidukikije bitagarukira gusa ku gusukura imihanda, ahubwo no kugabanya ibitera ibyuka bihumanya tugahumeka umwuka mwiza.
Ni byiza rero ko niba twifuza kuba inshuti z'Imana twirinda amaboko avusha amaraso.
Ni byiza rero ko umugabo amenya ndetse akaniga uburyo anyaza umugore we ; ibi bikajyana no kugenzura umuvuduko akoresha ; yakumva agiye kurangiza agakoresha uburyo aba aretseho gato kugirango abashe gufasha umugore we baze kurangiriza rimwe.

Njye zatabaye ubuzima bwanjye by'umwihariko.
Njyeze mu rugo, numva kubabara bitangiye gushira, ejo numva simbabaye, ejobundi mbona amaraso yahagaze.
Nk'abafatanyabikorwa ba Leta rero turabashima ko mwubahiriza ririya tegeko kandi muzahora muryubahiriza, mujye mukomeza no kuba ku isonga mu gushyigikira gahunda zose za Leta zigamije guteza imbere imibereho myiza y'abaturage.

NTAMBABAZI J Baptiste,ashimishwa no kuba mu murimo w'Imana buri gihe REV.
Nta mpamvu n' imwe yatuma tutishimira umwana twabyaye n' ubwo afite isura idasanzwe.
Nta mpamvu nimwe umubyeyi yagatanze ijyanye no kutabona umwanya wo kwita no gukurikirana umwana we kuko siniyumvisha ikindi aba akorera atari umuryango we.

REG BBC irashaka kwegukana bwa mbere igikombe cya shampiyona, kuko igiye muri shampiyona uyu mwaka.

Serivisi za BULK SMS (uburyo bwo kohereza ubutumwa bugufi ku bantu benshi icyarimwe) za Call Rwanda zikoreshwa n'ingeri nyinshi z'abantu zirimo inama z'ubukwe, ibigo by'amashuri, iby'ubwishingizi, ibya leta, ibitaro, banki, amatangazo yamamaza n'ibindi.

Twabonye akamaro k'uyu mugambi, twanabonye n'icyo ayo macakubiri yatugejejeho, ahasigaye ni uguhitamo, kandi guhitamo kwiza ni uguhitamo Umuryango w'Abanyarwanda, guhitamo kwiza ni ugusugira ugasagamba.

Twabonye ko hari ibikorwa byiza byinshi byakozwe, kandi hari n'ibindi yasezeranyije Abanyarwanda kuzabakorera, tubona ko bitaragerwaho, urugero ni nka gahunda y'icyerecyezo 2020.
Twafashe umwanya turavuga tuti ‘reka dupime abaturage batuye muri aka karere indwara zitandura zirimo diabete, umuvuduko w'amaraso, tukabapima ibiro n'uburebure kugira ngo turebe ko bijyanye.'
Twaganiriye na bamwe mu bahanzi b'abanyarwanda maze batubwira uko babasha kubana na byo.
Twaganiriye na Mutiganda wa Nkunda umwanditsi w'iyi filime maze atubwira byinshi ku mwuga we wo kwandika filime.
Twaganiriye na Ndabananiye Rwema Jean de la Croix, impuguke mu bijyanye n'imitekerereze ya muntu (psycologue clinician) maze agira byinshi abitubwiraho ndetse agira n'inama aha ababyeyi ku buryo byakorwa.
Twaganiriye n'inzobere mu buvuzi bw'indwara zo mu mutwe maze batangaza byinshi ku ihungabana, icyo ari cyo, ibimenyetso, ikiritera n'ibindi.
Twagarutse mu rugo Mama aduha kalibu ku meza ariko byaragaragaraga ko yahindutse, dusoje buri wese yihina mu cyumba cye.
Twagerageje kubabwira ibyiza byo kunywa amazi barabyumva ndetse bavuga ko bazajya bagerageza kunywa menshi kuko ubundi ngo bayanywaga biyunyuguza mu kanwa gusa.
Twagerageje kubaza abo mu Ishyirahamwe ry'imikino y'iteramakiofe mu Rwanda gusa ntabwo byadukundiye kubabona.
Twagerageje kubaza inararibonye mubya matorero n'Amadini ku byiyo myifatire mibi, adutangariza ko ahari imyifatire nkiyo nimivugire mibi y'iterabwoba ; baba bafite ibyo bikekaho bitari byiza mu mikorere yabo mibi itari iy'umucyo ahubwo y'umwijima.
Twagerageje kumuvugisha ariko yirinda kugira icyo abivugaho.

Twe tubona ko iyi banki atari banki igoranye."

Ubukene (Poverty) muri aka Karere buri ku kigero cya 62.0%, naho ubukene bukabije (Extreme Poverty) bukaba ku kigero cya 39.2%.

Uburenganzira bundi ni ubwerekeranye n'Umuryango (family freedom) nk'uburenganzira bwo gushinga urugo, hakaza uburenganzira ku mutungo bwite, keretse iyo awuvanywemo ku nyungu rusange kandi agahabwa indishyi ikwiye.
Uburenganzira bwo kubona amakuru harimo ibi bikurikira (mu gika cyayo cya nyuma) : "Kubona amakuru abitswe mu buryo ubwo ari bwo bwose bw'ikoranabuhanga cyangwa mu nyandiko zicapwe zivanywe muri mudasobwa cyangwa mu kindi kintu icyo ari cyo cyose".

Uburyo bwo kwirinda no kuvura indwara y'isukari (Diabetes mellitus) Indwara y'Isukari (Diabetes mellitus) Twamaze kubona icyo diabete aricyo, ubwoko bwayo, ibimenyetso byayo ndetse n'ingaruka zayo.

Ubushakshatsi bwakozwe n'abahanga mu byerekeranye n'imibonano mpuzabitsina, bagaragaje ko amasaha aba abereye bombi, umugabo n'umugore, mu gutera akabariro ari amasaha ya saa yine z'ijoro (22h00).

Urukundo rugira ibyarwo.
Urukundo rumutegeka kumugira umubambuzi wo gucunda, kuko abazigaba ari abase b'abasindi, ari bo banyiginya.
Urukundo rurizana, ntacyo rushingiyeho, abantu babiri bagakururana bagahuza, urukundo rwabo rukiyubaka rugakomera, kugeza ubwo umwe yiyumvamo undi, kandi ko iyo amubuze aba atuzuye.

Uyu muganga anavuga ko gukora siporo n'imyitozo ngorangingo bitavanaho ingaruka ingingo ziba zatewe no kumara umwanya munini umuntu yicaye.

Uyu mugore afite abana umunani, barimo imfura y'imyaka 14 yabyaranye na se, n'abandi barindwi yabyaye kuri musaza we.
Uyu mugore akomeza avuga ko kuba umugabo we yari afite abagore benshi byatumaga we agira inshingano nkeya mu rugo, ibintu yemeza ko yakunze cyane.
Uyu mugore akomeza avuga ko nyuma y'akanya gato iyi nzoka yagarutse maze Ntwali agahita ayica ngo haciyeho iminota itatu hamwe yiciye iya mbere haje indi nayo arayikubita arayica.

Uyu mugore avuga ko ikuzimu bigeze kumuha ubutumwa bwo kunaniza Rev.

Uyu mugore avuga ko umugoroba w'ababyeyi bawitabira hamwe n'abagabo babo, bityo ngo n'imihigo iteza imbere umuryango bayifatira hamwe, gusa asaba bagenzi be kurushaho kongera imbaraga mu guhesha umuryango agaciro.
Uyu mugore ngo kuri ubu yongeye kumwifuza cyane, asaba abantu bamugeraho ko bamumusabira akagaruka bakongera kubaka urugo rwabo bundi bushya bagafatanya kurera umwana wabo bakabyara n'abandi.
Uyu mugore ntakiri ingumba, umutwe warakize afite umunezero mu buzima bwe bwa buri munsi kandi ntagisambanywa n'abadaymoni.
Uyu mugore rero yaje gupanga kumucika, maze azana musaza we amuha akabari, n'abandi bakozi bose yazanye arabahemba arabirukana ariko Nsengiyumva we yanga gufata ibyo bihumbi mirongo itanu.
Uyu mugore ubwo bamusengeraga yaje kuvumburwa n'umwuka wera maze atangira ku murondora avuga ko yamubabarira nta mutamaze kuko ngo ari bamwe n'ubwo adakora kimwe nka pasteri wa musengeraga.
Uyu mugore ufitanye abana babiri n'uyu muhanzi, yahoze ari umugore w'Umuherwe w'Umugande Ivan Ssemwanga aho babyaranye abana batatu b'abahungu.
Uyu mugore umugabo babyaranye yaramutaye, amutana abana.

Uyu munsi kuwa kabiri bwo uregwa yazanye icyemezo cya muganga kimwemerera icyiruhuko cy'uburwayi (Repos Mediacl) cy'iminsi ine kubera imiti arimo gufata.
Uyu munsi nanjye niyemeje kubandikira ngo nsangize abandi igitekerezo cyanjye.
Uyu munsi ngaragiye ibyishimo byawe!"
Uyu munsi ngo byari akarusho gutombora umufariso munini cyane.
Uyu munsi ni uburyohe gusaaaaa n'amasomo menshi.
Uyu munsi nyuma yiyo nkuru yaje kunyandikira ambwira ngo iyo post yari ayifite kandi ngo intangiriro yo kugwa kwa muntu ni iyo.
Uyu munsi Perezida Kagame yiyamamarije ahantu hane mu Ntara u'Iburasirazuba: habiri muri Nyagatare, i Gatsibo n'i Kayonza.
Uyu munsi Police n'abafatanyabikorwa bayo berekanye ko biteguye kurushaho guhangana n'inkongi y'umuriro.
Uyu munsi sinabuza umuntu kubikora ahubwo navuge ibye hanyuma umwuka wera ukore ibyawo.

Uyu munsi tariki 26 Mata turaganira ijambo ry'Imana riri muri Ruka 24-49 hagira hati :" kandi dore ngiye kuboherereza ibyo data yasezeranye,ariko mugume mu murwa kugera ubwo muzambikwa imbaraga zivuye mu ijuru."
Uyu munsi uba wiganjemo amashami menshi abafite igisobanuro gikomeye mu buryo bw'umwuka.

Uyu munsi waranzwe n'ibiganiro n'ubusabane, witabiriwe n'ababyeyi n' urubyiruko rwinshi.
Uyu munsi waranzwe no kungurana ibitekerezo, kubaza ibibazo no gutanga ibisubizo hagati y'abitabiriye aya mahugurwa n'abayayoboye, byibandaga ku miyoborere myiza n'uburyo nyabwo bwo gusobanura uwo uriwe.

Uyu munwa nkoresha wavuga byinshi ariko ikizima ni iki: Papa wakubyaye yicuza impamvu wavutse!"

Uyu munyamategeko ahubwo uvuga ko yifuzaga gufasha ubutabera, avuga ko yaje gufata umwanzuro wo kureka kunganira Nyiramahirwe kuko yamusabaga kwemera icyaha undi akinangira.
Uyu munyamategeko kandi wavuze ko n'iyo ibi bikorwa bishinjwa umukiliya we yaba yarabikoze, bitagomba guhabwa igisobanuro cya ruswa.
Uyu munyamategeko wirinze kuvuga umubare w'amafaranga yahawe aba bakiliya be, avuga ko aya mafaranga yagenewe abakiliya be yakuwe mu nzu yabagamo Berinkindi wari waramaze kubona ubwenegihugu bwa Suwede.
Uyu munyamategeko yagize ati " Ibyo kwicara kuri mudasobwa isaha imwe ntibihagije kuko ntabwo ari gasuku ngo barahita babifata mu mutwe.
Uyu munyamateka w'imyaka 57 y'amavuko avuga ko abahanga muri Tewolojiya, mu byataburuwe mu matongo bashakashatse hose muri Israel ngo barebe niba hari ibintu byemeza bidasubirwaho ko Salomon koko yari umukire cyane ariko ngo barahebye.
Uyu munyanijeriya apfuye afite imyaka 52 y'amavuko.
Uyu munyarwandakazi avuga ko uyu mwuga wo guhanga imideli yawukundishijwe na Nyirakuru kuko yakoraga umwuga wo Kudoda bisanzwe (abo bakunze kwita aba-Tailleur).
Uyu munyarwandakazi uba imahanga ariko ukurikirana ibibera mu gihugu ke, avuga ko amatora areba buri munyarwanda kuko ibizayavamo ari byo bizakomeza gushimangira iyi ntambwe imaze guterwa.
Uyu munyarwandakazi utanga n'ikifuzo cyavamo umuti w'iki kibazo, avuga ko mu isomo mboneragihugu ryigishwa mu mashuri abanza hakwiye kongerwamo inyigisho zo gukangurira abana kutannyega bagenzi babo baba bafite ubumuga.
Uyu munyarwandakazi uvuga ko ahoza u Rwanda ku mutima, muri 2011 yaje mu Rwanda kugaragaza iyi nganzo ubwo yatumirwaga na Dady de Maximo wari wateguye iserukiramuco ry'imyambarire ryiswe ‘Rwanda fashion festival'.
Uyu munyarwandakazi wavukiye mu karere ka Huye akaza kujya kuba muri Uganda ku mpamvu z'amashuri, akunze kugaruka mu Rwanda, akavuga ko uko agarutse asanga igihugu cyararushijeho gutera imbere.
Uyu munyarwanda wanabanje kwigaragaza mu buhanzi bw'indirimbo mu Rwanda nyuma akaza kujya gukomereza ubuzima muri Canada ari naho yaje kubera icyamamare mu kumurika imideli.
Uyu Munyarwanda w'imyaka 27, arashaka guca agahigo mu bijyanye no guterura ibiremereye.
Uyu munyu kandi mu gihe uhuye n'amazi bikagera ku mubiri bishobora kwangiza uruhu.
Uyu mupfakazi avuga ko ubuhamya bwe na we abizi ko bitoroshye kubwizera, kuko ntawe bidatangaza kumva ko yavuye mu buzima bushaririye akaba amaze kwigeza kuri byinshi, kubera gahunda ya Girinka.
Uyu mupira ukinwa n'abafite ukuguru kumwe (bakina bafashe imbago), ariko umuzamu we aba afite amaguru yombi, ariko afite ubumuga bw'ukuboko kumwe.
Uyu mupolisi yavuze koi bi byigeze gukorwa hagamijwe kureba aho ifoto izaba igeze mu gihee kingana n'imyaka 6 ishize, ariko ibi bakaba barabikoze bagamije kureba aho igomba kuba igeze mu gihe kingana n'igice cy'isaha imwe gusa.

Uyu murenge wa Bweyeye wose ntabwo wigeze ugira amashanyarazi mbere.
Uyu murimo rero,ntabwo woroshye, twahagurukijwe n'Imana itubwiye ngo muhaguruke ndi inyuma yanyu.
Uyu muririmbyi wari wambaye imyenda yiganjemo amabara y'umukara avuga ko uyu munsi yahisemo kwambara iri bara kuko naryo arikunda cyane, akavuga ko na none amahitamo y'ibara ry'umwenda yambara biterwa n'uko yaramutse.
Uyu muririmbyi wifuza kubigira umwuga avuga ko kuba u Rwanda rwarayobowe na Kagame ari umugisha ku banyarwanda kuko yaciye amoko ryari ryacengejwe mu banyarwanda rigatuma habaho Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi igahitana ubuzima bw'abasaga miliyoni imwe.

Uyu muriro uzagabanya ingendo twakoraga tujya I Burundi tujya gusudira ibyuma byacu, amagare na za moto.
Uyu murongo ufunguye vuba gahunda yo kwerekana Shampiyona Mpuzamahanga nka Euroligue, ikaba yaranashyizeho uburyo bwo kubona amashene menshi, ndetse bugatuma nyirayo abasha kureba izo yifuza n'igihe ashakiye witwa SVOD.

Uyu muryango ntuzibagirwa uyu munsi.
Uyu muryango ugeze ku rwego rwo kwakira abanyeshuri 80 biga iyi myuga itandukanye buri mwaka, muri aba biga barimo abagiye barangiza ibyiciro bitandukanye by'amashuri, mu biga muri uyu mwaka harimo uwarangije amasomo ya kaminuza.
Uyu muryango ugeze ku rwego rwo kwakira abanyeshuri 80 biga iyi myuga itandukanye, muri aba biga barimo abagiye barangiza ibyiciro bitandukanye by'amashuri, mu biga muri uyu mwaka harimo uwarangije amasomo ya kaminuza.
Uyu muryango uhuza ibihugu byo muri Africa y'Iburengerazuba wavuze ko uzafatira ibihano Yahya Jammeh igihe azaba yanze kuva ku butegetsi.
Uyu muryango ukora ibikorwa byo gukangurira abantu kureka no kurwanya ibikorwa by'ihohoterwa, ndetse no gufasha abahuye n'ihohoterwa kongera kugaruka mu ubuzima busanzwe.
Uyu muryango urifuza gukora ibyo abantu bise amahano Mu kwihutisha icyo gikorwa Wycliffe Associates (WA) uri guhindura imyandikire, unahindura amagambo icyarimwe.
Uyu muryango urwanyakwegurira ibikorwa abikorera ku giti cyabo na politiki y ubwisanzure bw'amasoko.
Uyu muryango uvuga ko bimwe mu bikorwa uteganya kuzakora ari uguhindura imyumvure y'abanyarwanda bakabasha gukunda, gukora no kwishimira iby'iwabo kuko bifite ubwiza budasanzwe.
Uyu muryango uvuga ko kurengera ibidukikije bigomba gukorwa habanje gukorwa ubushakashatsi.
Uyu muryango uvuga ko utabujije abantu kurya inyama zitukura, ngo ariko bagabanye ingano yazo mu ifunguro ryabo.
Uyu muryango wanatubwiye ko imvura nyinshi iherutse kugwa yasenye inzu babagamo ubu bimwe mu bintu byabo bikaba bibitswe n'abaturanyi ; ntibafite n'aho kujya nyuma yo kuva mu bitaro.
Uyu muryango wasenyutse kubera impamvu zirimo kuba abaturage bataragishwaga inama mu ishyirwaho rya gahunda z'umuryango n'ishyirwa mu bikorwa ryazo.
Uyu muryango wemeza ko izi mpunzi ziramutse zishyize hamwe, zakora igihugu cya 21 mu kugira abaturage benshi.

Uyu musaza ubundi agenerwa $136 ku kwezi, ariko ngo ahita ayaguramo ibintu byo gutwika cyangwa se rimwe na rimwe bayamuha agahita ayatwika.
Uyu musaza ubusanzwe acuruza ibintu biciriritse ku gisima birimo indagara, amoko atandukanye y'amafu ndetse n'indyoshya ndyo (ibirungo).
Uyu musaza wanywaga itabi cyane, yabayeho imyaka iruta iy'abagore be bane bose, abavandimwe be 10 n'abana be bose.
Uyu musemburo na wo utuma harekurwa "endorphins", ariyo ikuraho ibijyanye n'ububabare ; nk'umutwe ukabije.

Uyu mushakashatsi avuga ko uyu mugabane w'ikirwa wavumbuwe ugaragaraho bimwe mu bice byagiye biwugwaho biturutse ku birunga byagiye biruka.
Uyu mushakashatsi yavuze ko ibijyanye no gucunga impapuro za leta no kuzigeraho binyuranye n'itegeko nshinga.
Uyu mushinga kandi waje kwaguka uha amahirwe rumwe mu rubyiruko rw'impunzi kwiga amashuri makuru na za Kaminuza ku nkunga z'ibigo bitandukanye nka DAFI ifasha abanyeshuri 91 biga muri za kaminuza zitandukanye mu Rwanda.
Uyu mushinga wabahesheje umwanya wa mbere mu bihugu bya Afurika byari byayitabiriye birimo Afurika y'Epfo, Nigeria, Ghana, Mauritius, Gambia na Misiri ndetse baba aba cyenda ku isi.
Uyu mushinga wampinduye ibitekerezo cyane; kuko ari bwo naje gusobanukirwa nyabyo ibijyanye n'uburyo u Rwanda ruri mu bihugu byugarijwe no kutita ku bidukikije.
Uyu mushinga wazanywe n'uyu mudepite witwa Farrar ushyiraho amabwiriza umugabo akwiye kugenderaho mu kurengera ubuzima bwe.
Uyu mushinga we w'ubworozi bw'ingurube Shirimpumu yawutangiye mu mwaka wa 2009, ariko awutangira gahoro gahoro, awubangikanya n'akazi yakoraga mu Kigo cya RBC (Rwanda Biomedical Centre).
Uyu mushinga w'itegeko wagiweho impaka zikomeye zagarutse cyane ku gahimbazamusyi gateganyijwe guhabwa uwatanze amakuru.
Uyu mushinga w'itegeko watowe ku bwisanzure busesuye wemezwa n'Inteko rusange y'Abadepite, uzasubira imbere ya Perezida awusinyeho usubire muri Guverinoma wemezwe uhite usohoka mu Igazeti ya Leta nk'itegeko ryubahirizwa.
Uyu mushinga wo kubaka ibyo bibuga uje nyuma y'aho bigaragariye ko Sitade ikunze kwakira imikino y'intoki ( Petit Stade) yabaye ihuriro ry'imikino myinshi bigatuma abantu batayikoresha uko babyifuza.
Uyu mushoramari mu bucuruzi bw'imyenda avuga ko biba byiza iyo ufite umucuruzi w'imyenda muziranye kuko amenyera imyambaro ukunda ndetse yabona icyo ukunda akaba yagutumaho cyangwa akakuzanira mu rugo.
Uyu mushyitsi ko yaba ari maman Kenny ra(sindagura ndagena!).
Uyu musifuzi yafashe umwanzuro wo guha ikarita itukura uyu musore bita Meddy bituma Police FC imara iminota 40 y'umukino bakina ari icumi.
Uyu musigiti washinzwe hatangaje ko uhaye ikaze buri wese yaba Umuyisilamu w'umu Sunni cyangwa uw'umu- Shiite ndetse n'ababana bahuje ibitsina na bo ntibahejwe.
Uyu Musore akimara gushikuza umugore isakoshi ngo yahise yiruka yenekera abamwirutseho, akuramo amafaranga na Telefone arangije isakoshi arayita arigendera nyuma y'iminsi mike atangira gucika intege kugeza agiye kurebe uwo yayibye.
Uyu musore avuga ko yafashije na bagenzi be batandatu bari bafite icyo kibazo, abakangurira kujya kwikosoza ku mudugudu na bo birakemuka ku buryo nta nzitizi zo kuzitabira amatora ya Perezida bafite.
Uyu musore biteganyijwe ko agaruka mu Rwanda kuri uyu wa gatatu aho aza kwitabira imyitozo y'ikipe y'igihugu ya Volleyball yitegura irushanwa ry'Akarere ka gatanu rizatangira muri Kamena uyu mwaka.
Uyu musore ni umwe mu bakinnyi bakunda kwambara neza cyane.
Uyu musore se asigaye aba aha?"
Uyu musore uteganya kumurika imideli mu bihugu byo hanze, ntaramara igihe kinini muri uyu mwuga avuga ko icyamuteye kwinjiramo ari uko yabikundaga.
Uyu musore uvuka i Rubavu yabwiye Umuseke ko inshingano yahawe zamutunguye cyane kuko nta gihe amaze muri iyi kipe.
Uyu musore wafashwe asambana yari yimutse mu nzu yabagamo ajya mu yo yateganyaga kurongoreramo.
Uyu musore wageze ku rubyiniro bigasa nk'ibihinduye isura muri Stade, yaririmbye nta gihunga agaragaza ko yifitiye ikizere.
Uyu musore w'imyaka 22 yashimangiye ko adateganya kugaragara mu mikino ya CHAN kuko nubwo ashaka guhindura ikipe, ngo kugaruka gukina mu Rwanda ntabwo abikozwa.
Uyu musore w'imyaka 26 gusa yavuze ko abitewe no gufatwa nabi n'abayobora uyu mukino.
Uyu musore w'imyaka 32 ukomoka muri Ireland y'Amajyaruguru, yatoje u Rwanda kuva muri Werurwe 2015 aza kwirukanwa muri Kanama 2016 kubera umusaruro mubi watumye Amavubi abura itike y'igikombe cya Afurika cya 2017.
Uyu musore wo mu kigero cy'imyaka 25 na 30 avuga ko muri gereza yize ibijyanye no gusiga amarangi, ariko ko nta n'umwe umugirira icyizere ngo abe yamuha akazi.
Uyu musore w'umwirabura asa nurongoye nyirakuru kuko umugore we ashaje cyane.
Uyu musore yageze ku bitaro nta gitsina afite yagikase bigaragara ko ashobora kuba afite uburwayi bwo mu mutwe cyangwa yari yafashwe n'amadayimoni kuko ariwe wikoreye uru rukozasoni."
Uyu musore yagiriye inama yo kwihana abakundana bahuje ibitsina kuko nta kiza na kimwe kibibamo uretse gukuramo indwara zitandukanye.
Uyu musore yaje ambwira byose, ntacyo atazi kuri njyewe, niba yarabikuye hehe ntabwo mbizi!"
Uyu musore yashinjwaga kujyana abana batujuje imyaka y'ubukure mu kabari no kubararana muri Lodge bikaba ngo byari biteye kwibaza ko atabasambanyije, nubwo ngo ibimenyetso byari gutangwa n'abaganga kuri iki.
Uyu musore yavuze icyakorwa kugira ngo ibyabaye mu Rwanda bitazasubira ukundi ati "urubyiruko rugomba kwigishwa, rukamenya ibyabaye".
Uyu musoro wa VAT (Value Added Tax) niwo ugize igice kinini cy'imisoro ikusanywa mu gihugu (hejuru ya 40%), buri munyarwanda agize ubushake bwo gusaba umucuruzi inyemezabwishyu nyayo ko yawutanze hakusanywa imisoro irenze cyane iboneka ubu.
Uyu mutangabuhamya avuga ko ibyo bakoraga byose bashyikirizaga raporo ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima (RBC).
Uyu mutoza akomeza atangaza ko barushije Gicumbi FC kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe babonye kandi byabahiriye, kuko batsindaga.
Uyu mutoza wanze kugira byinshi avuga kuri iyi nkuru kuko yumva ari uguta umwanya, yasabye abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru kubifata nk'ibihuha.
Uyu mutoza yabwiye abanyamakuru ko yifuza kugeza abanyarwanda ku nzozi zabo, harimo gusubira mu gikombe cya Afurika.
Uyu mutoza yabwiye Umuseke ko bajyanye intego yo kwegukana irushanwa.
Uyu mutoza yagize ati "gutoza aba bakinnyi ntibyoroshye kuko ubushobozi bwabo bwo kumva ni buke, kwihangana kwabo ni guke niyo mpamvu bamwe batashye mbere y'uko imikino irangira".
Uyu mutoza yakomeje avuga ko ikipe ye nubwo idafite inararibonye, ariko bafite ikizere cyo kuza mu makipe ane ya mbere mu Rwanda, kandi bagahatanira ibikombe mu myaka iri imbere.
Uyu muturage agira ati "Komisiyo yaje guhindura uburyo yatangagamo agahimbazamushyi k'abakorerabushake, ihagarika kuyabaha mu ntoki ikajya iyanyuza kuri nomero ya konti zabo, ngo bamwe bagiye babona amafaranga abandi ntiyabageraho."
Uyu muturage atangaza ko yoroye inka bwa mbere ayihawe, aho ngo yanakekaga ko atazayishobora; ubu ngo akaba adapfa kubona amagambo akoresha avuga ibyiza bya Girinka.
Uyu muturage kimwe na bagenzi be bavuga ko ibi babikora nta kwikandagira guhari kuko ngo bamaze kumva ko ari uburenganzira bwabo kandi biganisha kuri Demokarasi hagati yabo n'inzego za Leta.

Yababwiye kandi anabasobanurira zimwe mu mpamvu zishobora gutera ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina zirimo ubukene, ubujiji, umuco n'ibindi.
Yababwiye kandi ko abakozi b'akarere bajyaga babirukankana batazongera na rimwe kubikora, kuko byagaragaye ko babikora nabi babahutaza kugera n'ubwo babica.
Yababwiye kandi ko ibihugu by'amahanga bishaka kugena uko ibindi bihugu bibaho nk'uko babikoze kera, abahishurira ko nabo bizabageraho no mu gihe cyabo, bityo ko bakwiye guhora baharanira ko igihugu cyabo gitera imbere.
Yababwiye kandi ko kudacika intege no gukomera ku ntego byatumye abarwanaga bagira imbaraga batsinda urugamba nubwo bwose babaga bari mu buzima bushaririye kandi ari nako umwanzi ataboroheye abamishaho amasasu y'urufaya.
Yababwiye ko azashimangira ibyagezweho ariko agashyira imbaraga mu gukangurira abaturage kubyara abo bashoboye kurera.
Yababwiye ko bagomba gutanga serivisi zinoze kandi zihuse kuko ubutabera butinze buba bwamaze gutakaza ireme ryabwo.
Yababwiye ko ibiyobyabwenge bihindura imitekerereze, imigirire n'imyitwarire y'umuntu ubinywa kugera ubwo bimutera gukora ibikorwa binyuranije n'amategeko kuko ko nta mutimanama aba afite.
Yababwiye ko ibyangombwa bihari kugira ngo bakomeza gukora biteza imbere.
Yababwiye ko imihigo bahize nibayesa nta mwana uzongera kugwingira muri aka gace cyangwa ngo arware indwara zikomoka ku mwanda n'imirire mibi.
Yababwiye ko mu Rwanda nta cyo igihugu kitashobora ngo Umunyarwanda aterembere.

Yagaragaje kandi ko igitekerezo gishingiye kuri matter kandi ko kitahinduka hatariho matter.
Yagaragaje kandi uko umuntu abantu babona atandukanye cyane n'umuntu abantu batabona Ati "Nahoraga nigisha abantu uko bakwiye kubaho ariko ibyo nkabikorera mu ruhame nyamara naba nihishe ngakora ibidakorwa.
Yagaragaje ko hakiri impungenge zo kuba muri uyu mugabane nta bushobozi bwo kwitunganyiriza imitungo kamere.
Yagaragaje ko ibikorwa bya Team Heart byunganira u Rwanda mu rugamba rwo kongera kubaka ibikorwa remezo, n'inzego byashenywe n'ubuyobozi bubi bwateguye jenoside bukayishyira no mu bikorwa.
Yagaragaje ko iki gikorwa gishingiye ku bikorwa Perezida Paul Kagame yahize byo gushyigikira imiyoborere igamije kwimakaza ubumwe n'ubunyarwanda.
Yagarutse ku banenze ubufatanye bwabo na FPR muri aya matora, avuga ko umubano wa PSD na FPR Inkotanyi umaze imya 25, aho ngo ababyifuzaga ukundi kuri bo ntacyo bibabwiye kuko atari abayoboke babo.
Yagarutse ku banyamahanga banenga ibyo Abanyarwanda bamaze kugeraho n'abandi banyarwanda bashaka kugendera mu nzira mbi z'ababoshya.
Yagarutse ku buryo bwo kongerera abagore ubushobozi ngo nabo bagire uruhare mu iterambere ry'uyu mugabane, ashima intambwe u Rwanda rumaze gutera ku buryo bari mu nzego zose z'igihugu.
Yagarutse ku mashyaka 8 yiyemeje gufatanya na FPR Inkotanyi mu rugendo rwo kubaka igihugu.

Yakomeje asobanura uburyo hari undi muyobozi yitabaje ngo azajye kumufasha kwereka nyina ko atari we muhutu wenyine uri muri Politiki, ariko ngo uwo muyobozi we yamweretse ko arwana n'ibirenze ibye.

Yakomeje avuga ati :"Iyo hari amahoro Polisi ijya mu bikorwa byo gusabana n'abaturage no kubageza ku bikorwa by'iterambere, igakinana n'abaturage umupira kandi byose bishoboka kubera umutekano dufite."
Yakomeje avuga ati :"Polisi y'u Rwanda ntizihanganira umuntu wese urigisa cyangwa utwara ibitamugenewe, kuko uretse no kuba ari icyaha gihanwa n'amategeko ntibinari mu ndangagaciro z'abanyarwanda."
Yakomeje avuga ati :"Turasaba ko ubufatanye bw'ubuyobozi n'abaturage bwakomeza, kuko nibwo butuma ibyiza nk'ibi bigerwaho, muzakomeze kubisigasira no kubirinda kwangirika."

Yashishikarije urubyiruko kuzashishoza igihe cy'amatora narwo rugatora uwo rubona ubikwiye kandi wagiye agaragaza ko yiteguye kumva ibitekerezo byarwo.

Yavuze ko Leta imaze kwakira ubusabe bwo kujyana ibiribwa hanze y'igihugu ariko ko nta burenganzira iratanga, nk'uko bitangazwa n'Ikinyamakuru Mwananchi.
Yavuze ko mu gihe amaze aba mu mahanga asanga u Rwanda rwarageze ku yindi ntera mu bintu bitandukanye.
Yavuze ko mu gihe umuntu atanga ibitekerezo bye mu gihugu kigendera kuri Demokarasi atari byiza kwibasira umuntu ashingiye ku mpamvu iyo ari yo yose.
Yavuze ko mu gitondo kimwe ubwo yari yicaye ku buriri bwe, umwe mu banyeshuri biganaga abona atangiye gufurutwa mu gatuza ke ahita ahamagara umuganga.
Yavuze ko muri iki gihe ibyoherezwayo bingana na 25% ariko mu myaka itanu umuhigo ari uko bizaba bigeze ku kigero cya 75%.
Yavuze ko mu Rwanda nta bushakashatsi burakorwa ku mpamvu zitera kubyara abana benshi, gusa ngo nko muri Amerika bishobora kuba ingaruka z'uburyo bw'ikoranabuhanga ryo gutera intanga.
Yavuze ko Mwitende kuba ahamwa n'icyaha cy'impurirane agomba guhanishwa igihano gisumba ibindi mu biteganywa n'ingingo ihana icyo cyaha.
Yavuze ko natorwa ngo iki kibazo azakirangiza, ku buryo nta mukene uzajya abura uko yuvuza.
Yavuze ko ngo bamubwiye ngo ‘Duhe amafaranga nibitaba uko turakwica.'
Yavuze ko nubwo bagiye mu kiruhuko batananiwe ku buryo batazatanga umusanzu wabo mu kubaka igihugu.
Yavuze ko nubwo MINALOC ifite ubushake bwo gufasha abafite ubumuga kwiteza imbere ngo imwe mu mbogamizi ni uko ingengo y'imari hari ubwo iba idahagije kandi ikaba isaranganyije muri Minisiteri zose zifite aho zihuriye n'imibereho myiza y'abaturage.
Yavuze ko nubwo nta bakinnyi ba filime azi bo mu Rwanda, ko ari ikibazo cyo kuba mu Rwanda nta channel ya television ifite umwihariko wo kwerekana filime nyarwanda ihari ariyo mbogamizi.
Yavuze ko nyuma y'ibi bagiye kureba abakoze imyigaragambyo nta mpamvu ifatika n'uburemere bwabyo ubundi barebe ibihano babaha bijyanye n'imyitwarire.
Yavuze ko Polisi yajyanye uwo mubiri kwa ku bitaro bikuru bya Kaminuza (CHUB) ngo ukorerwe isuzuma.
Yavuze ko Sweden ikorana cyane n'igihugu cya Finland.
Yavuze ko ubugenzacyaha bugomba kuzicarana n'abandi barebwa n'iki kibazo hakigwa uburyo byakorwa bitabangamiye ukurikiranyweho ‘icyaha cyo gusabiriza'.
Yavuze ko ubushobozi na bwo ari ngombwa kandi bidakwiye kubutagaguza,ahubwo ko hakwiye kubaka uburyo burambye mu gukemura ibibazo bivuka.
Yavuze ko ubwo yajyaga kwiyamamariza mu karere ka Nyagatare yakumiriwe n'ubuyobozi bwamujyanye kwiyamamariza mu irimbi ndetse bukanamuteza abamotari n'abana b'abanyeshuri bamukomeraga kucyo yabaga avuze cyose kandi banafite amabendera ya FPR inkotanyi.
Yavuze ko ukwigira kwa Afurika kutashingira ku bihugu bikomeye, ahubwo buri kimwe kigomba kuzuza uruhare rwacyo ngo intego za AU zigerweho.
Yavuze ko umugororwa umwe ariwe wakomerekeye muri iyi nkongi bikomeye n'aho abandi babiri bakomeretse byoroheje ubwo basohorwaga muri gereza bahungishwa inkongi.
Yavuze ko Umutwe w'Ingabo z'u Rwanda zirwanira mu kirere muri UNMISS ugizwe n'abantu 165 bakora imirimo itandukanye harimo abapilote, abatekinisiye b'indege n'abashinzwe ibikoresho.
